definition: the brush stroke that dots in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Italian designer accessories products will benefit your life in the CBD.
sentences.chinese: 名家設計的意利配件類產品會是您生活的點睛之筆。

sentences.english: Polished river stones make for a nice finishing touch in your Chinese rock garden.
sentences.chinese: 拋光石頭河爲一個不錯的點睛之筆在中國岩石園。

sentences.english: The Van Cleef &Arpels necklace is a spectacular complement.
sentences.chinese: 梵克雅寶的項鍊就是點睛之筆。
